attributes.action: Pay supermarket staff danger money during epidemic.
attributes.additional_details: Supermarket staff are at great risk as one of only places open. They are risking lives mostly on minimum wage. It has been proved supermarkets are a big source of contamination.
attributes.background: Pay the workers extra as they are at great risk providing essential service.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Mandatory Hazard Pay for all workers on the front line in the COVID-19 pandemic
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557249
